venue.name: John Slade Ely House - Center for Contemporary Art

item.description:
Stacy Phillips and Phil Zimmerman will be playing a free concert at the John Slade Ely House. Stacy and Phil play a wide range of material from the traditional repertoire of the American South, with Lots of old time fiddle tunes, ballads and some hot dobro playing.

Stacy Phillips is an internationally acclaimed dobro (acoustic steel) guitarist and violin player. He has performed with the top acoustic musicians over the world including Mark O'Connor, Bela Fleck, Leon Redbone, David Bromberg and many others. He has three solo albums and is featured artist on the Grammy award-winning album The Great Dobro Sessions.

Some accolades:

"Stacy Phillips playing is compelling and moving."
- - - Acoustic Guitar magazine

"among the most imaginative and innovative dobro players"
- - -SingOut magazine

"Dobro guitar virtuoso. . .stretching the stylistic limits of his
instrument."
- - -Dirty Linen magazine

For more information visit his website at www.stacyphillips.com

Phil Zimmerman is a long time multi-instrumentalist in the Connecticut acoustic scene. He currently performs with Last Fair Deal and American Flyer, in addition to the duet with Stacy.

Your contact person for this event is Becky: (203) 901-3180 (Becky will be working the gallery there that night)
item.name: Sat. 4/21 - Free Concert at the John Slade Ely House
